sys_script_include.name: getEmpDet

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_8b56356a47a2e21046f7b3f4116d43c4
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1791348_travel_0.getEmpDet</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>getEmpDet</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var getEmpDet = Class.create();
getEmpDet.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getEmpInfo: function() {
        var empId = this.getParameter('sysparm_empnum');
        var result = {};

        gs.info("Received Employee ID: " + empId);

        var empGR = new GlideRecord('x_1791348_travel_0_employee_details'); // ✅ Use your actual employee table here
        empGR.addQuery('sys_id', empId); // Use sys_id if you're passing it instead
        empGR.query();

        if (empGR.next()) {
            gs.info('Employee record found.');

            result.name = empGR.name + '';
            result.email = empGR.email + '';
            result.contact_number = empGR.contact_number + '';
            result.project = empGR.project + '';
            result.tdm_or_account_manager = empGR.tdm_or_account_manager + '';
            result.card_number = empGR.card_number + '';
            result.bank_name_of_the_card = empGR.bank_name_of_the_card + '';
        } else {
            gs.info('No employee record found for ID: ' + empId);
        }

        return JSON.stringify(result);
    },

    type: 'getEmpDet'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-07-08 06:36:16</sys_created_on><sys_id>8b56356a47a2e21046f7b3f4116d43c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getEmpDet</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Travel Card Recharge Request Details" source="x_1791348_travel_0">0c19c259476a6a1046f7b3f4116d4358</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Travel Card Recharge Request Details">0c19c259476a6a1046f7b3f4116d4358</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8b56356a47a2e21046f7b3f4116d43c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-07-14 10:17:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
